titleStmt.title: Paradise lost a poem in twelve books / the author John Milton.
titleStmt.author: Milton, John, 1608-1674.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition revised and augmented by the same author.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: frontispiece lacking in filmed copy.
Earlier editions were divided into 10 books.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
